list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Added a bottom button bar (still needs to be programmed and designed better)
TODO: (like 3 updated and 2 removed, main marked with '!')
-! fix the ui: bottom buttons need a rounded rectangle click area, do that with Material and InkWell
- maybe make better MVC, some logic could still be better separated i think
- calculate the bounding rect icon size based on the CENTER_PERCENTAGE variable
-! add nail rect size detection (too big/too small)
- change the model location to be accessible by both Android and iOS (minor issue, also work on iOS later)
-! add photo instructions and program them (maybe a CarouselView)
- zoom selector is missing (minor issue)

task.summary: Added camera feed when clicking on camera button
Added camera feed when clicking on camera button

Switched to the cameraawesome package for better UI
TODO: zoom selector is missing add opencv integration add instructions

Messing around with mlkit image detection
TODO: zoom selector is missing add !tflite! integration add instructions

tflite model almost working (detected only computer mouse, needs restarting the camera after use)
TODO: zoom selector is missing add instructions

Switched from using onImageAnalysis, preparing to switch to YOLO
TODO: zoom selector is missing add instructions

Working YOLO model
TODO: opening the saved image stopped working detecting if the nail is in the center is broken zoom selector is missing add instructions

Refactored the YOLO setup and showing results on screen, fixed opening the saved image by taking a screenshot of the view, changed the resolution to portrait only
TODO: (3 new, main marked with '!') -! add nail rect size detection (too big/too small)
- consider only showing the full list after taking the picture? (maybe too much info/annoying flickering)
- change the model location to be accessible by both Android and iOS (minor issue, also work on iOS later)
-! detecting if the nail is in the center is broken(YOLOView is probably returning a different rect format)
-! add instructions (maybe a CarouselView)
- zoom selector is missing (minor issue)

Visual changes to result list, set the nail outline to show together with YOLOView, not before it

- calculate the bounding rect icon size based on the CENTER_PERCENTAGE variable

- change the model location to be accessible by both Android and iOS (minor issue, also work on iOS later)
-! detecting if the nail is in the center is broken(YOLOView is probably returning a different rect format)
-! add instructions (maybe a CarouselView)
- zoom selector is missing (minor issue)
